issue.title: "./dev/run_docker_compose.sh" is out of date
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4192](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4192). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Parquet repo shouldn't be required anymore.

```bash

$ ./dev/run_docker_compose.sh iwyu
Please clone the Parquet repo next to the Arrow repo
```

Also, there's another error when trying to run `docker-compose` directly:
```bash

$ docker-compose -f arrow/dev/docker-compose.yml build iwyu
ERROR: build path /home/antoine/arrow/dev/dask_integration either does not exist, is not accessible, or is not a valid URL.
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4192?focusedCommentId=16763311) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~kszucs]` is this still an issue?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4192?focusedCommentId=16777314) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3695
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3695>
